title: How long does it take for League to answer tickets
body: I sent a ticket concerning a ban because I began to want to play league again after like two years, and I saw i was banned and I wanted to see for what.

replies.body: Typically the average wait time is around 12-14~ hours. If you haven't checked, be sure to check again since it looks like someone has already replied!
what email is it sent from so I can just look up the email in the inbox? I cant seem to find it

Should be the verified email on the account, or the email that you submitted the ticket from. We can't give out that info though since it's kinda personal information. Be sure to check any emails you could have used to send it.
but what was the email that riot support used? its easier to search for it lol
Its sad but they don't unban anyone unless it was in error or they are a massive celebrity.
